announce_features: Lich 5.4.1 includes:
Updates and fixes for 5.4.0 which included:
unique Simu supplied id (uid) for each room
Configurable display at Room Title of the Lich ID and UID
No more 5 minute time out
empty_hands and fill_hands will now wait out round time before action
Spell timers should be significantly more accurate in ;magic and legacy scripts
Updates to support others' script development
